altername_name: Jibaku-kun: Rei no Itsuki no Kajitsu
name: Jibaku-kun: Zero no Ki no Kajitsu
overview: An unreleased action-RPG based on the Jibaku-Kun manga/anime by Ami Shibata. It is unclear who exactly developed the game, but both Enterbrain and Media Factory are credited in the opening splash screens.
